name: Death Planet: The Dog Star Adventure
overview: Lance Micklus, who has authored some of the finest programs available today, has chaneled his energies into the making of his first adventure. Now comes DEATH PLANET: THE DOG STAR ADVENTURE - an exhilarating dip into a peril-filled universe! The evil General Doom and his Roche Soldiers are preparing to launch an attack against the forces of freedom lead by the beautiful Princess Leya. The Princess has been captured by Doom - and it's up to you to pull off a daring rescue and save her and the royal treasury!
